price: Yeroo ishee keessatti darbaman isheedhaaf (sagalee akka) halaaka harree dhaga'u,haala isheen danfuutti jirtuun.
arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
